properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Rakshana nosagedu Yesuni premanu lakshyamu cheyumu o priyudaa akshaya raajyamu neeyanu vachina rakshakun bogadumu snehithudaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lokapu premanu yemani thelpeda nee kavamaanambe dalachinacho maarani Yesuni rakshakun prema dhaakudu nondumu o priyudaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Paapapu premalo viduvaka nilichina thaapamu chendeda vo narudaa paapini gaavanu prema swaroopudu shaapamu norchenu calvarilo{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Chachchina paapini vedaki rakshimpa chachchi brathikina ghanu devadu vachina paapini vaddani throyani nishchala premaa mayudu Yese{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nammumu sodaraa ninnu rakshinchunu nemmadi Nondedavu nijamu namminacho prabhu premanu gaanavu nammumu prabhu prema neediname{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ghana dhani kula matha soundharyambulan gaanavu nija premaa dharanal ennila nunnanu niluchune nityamu pennuga pondumu prabhu preman{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Tandri kumaara shuddatmala chittamun dandiga neraverchuchu ghanulu endaro negiri pondanu Makutamu pondumu prabhu prema Halleluya{/lang-eng}
